short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for two items: GSIN 1560-20-A0Y0033 and GSIN 9552-20-A0Y0034. Bidders interested in submitting bids must ensure their products meet the specifications of these items.
full_summary:
#### Government of Canada – Department of National Defence

**Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal**

**Project Title:** Procurement of Aluminum Channels
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01009304

**Introduction**

The Government of Canada, Department of National Defence, invites bidders to submit a proposal for the procurement of aluminum channels. The request for proposal (RFP) aims to acquire the required materials for the Canadian Armed Forces.

**Scope of Work**

The following items are required:

* Item 1: Aluminum Channel, GSIN number: 1560, NSN: 20-A0Y0033
	+ Quantity: 12 units
	+ Unit of issue: Each (EA)
	+ Part number: AL ALY 5086/H111
	+ Manufacturer: NAMES, NAMES, NAMES, INC.
	+ NCAGE: 5FR80
* Item 2: Aluminum Channel, GSIN number: 9520, NSN: 20-A0Y0034
	+ Quantity: 18 units
	+ Unit of issue: Each (EA)
	+ Part number: AL ALY 5086/H111 20'
	+ Manufacturer: NAMES, NAMES, NAMES, INC.
	+ NCAGE: 5FR80

**Key Specifications and Requirements**

* Bidders must provide prices in Canadian dollars.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers.
* Preference is given to Canadian goods and/or services.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Important Dates**

* Publication date: 2022-10-05
* Tender closing date: 2022-11-04T14:00:00
* Amendment date: 2022-10-20 (see attached documents for details)

**Where to Obtain Documents**

The RFP, amendment documents, and other relevant information can be accessed through the Canadabuys Canada website.

**Contact Information**

Christopher Cauchi
canada.ca
christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca

Please review the tender announcement carefully and submit your proposal according to the specified requirements. We look forward to receiving your proposal.

---

**Footnote:**

* The Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers and may change the requirements at any time.
* All bids must be received by the designated closing date and time.
* Late submissions will not be accepted.

Sincerely,
[Department of National Defence]

Published on Canadabuys Canada: <https://can
